BACK TO POLICIES 382 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Policy RW3 Waste collection facilities in new development 1. All new development must include sufficient accessible space to separate and store dry recyclables, organics, residual and bulky waste for collection, both within individual units and for the building as a whole. Waste storage facilities within developments should be designed to avoid any adverse amenity impacts.
